name: プロデューサー
text:
悪くなかったと思うんだが……
こういうこともあるさ、次、頑張ろう！
trans:
I don't think you did poorly...
But stuff like this happens from time to time.
We'll get them next time!

name: 夏葉
text:
プロデューサー……ありがとう
そうね、落ち込んでばかりもいられないわ
trans:
Producer... Thank you.
You're right. I don't need to let this keep me down.

name: 夏葉
text: ……ねぇ、この後時間あるかしら？
trans: ...Hey, do you have some time after this?

name: 夏葉
text:
事務所に戻って反省会よ
私ひとりじゃ限界があるから手伝って欲しいの
trans:
We're going back to the office for a review session.
There's only so much I can do on my own, so I'd like
you to help.

name: 夏葉
text:
どうすればもっと良くなるのか……
アナタの意見を聞かせてちょうだい？
trans:
I want to know what I can do to be better...
Would you mind if I asked for a bit of guidance?

name: プロデューサー
text: よし、わかった！　とことん付き合うぞ！
trans: Alright, I've got you covered! I'll stay as long as you need!
